Container.Name: PlexStarCleaner
Container.Description: A scheduled Docker container that automatically cleans up watched Plex media from Sonarr and Radarr based on community user ratings.
Container.Changes: [b]2025-09-16[/b] - Added required PLEX_TOKEN for API authentication. [b]2023-10-28[/b] - Added RATING_MODE and SERIES_WATCH_MODE for flexible deletion logic. [b]2023-10-27[/b] - Initial Release

Config.Name: Dry Run
Config.Description: Set to 'true' to log actions without deleting files. Set to 'false' to enable deletion.

Config.Name: Excluded Libraries
Config.Description: (Optional) Comma-separated list of Plex libraries to ignore (e.g., eLearning,Home Videos).

Config.Name: Rating Mode
Config.Description: [average]: Delete if average rating is too low. [any_high]: Keep if ANY user rates it high enough.

Config.Name: Series Watch Mode
Config.Description: [full]: Process series only when fully watched. [bored]: Process series after any episode is watched.

Config.Name: Days Delay
Config.Description: Days since last watched before media is considered for deletion.

Config.Name: Rating Threshold
Config.Description: Media with a rating BELOW this value will be deleted.

Config.Name: Cron Schedule
Config.Description: Time of day (HH:MM) in 24-hour format to run the daily job.

Config.Name: Tautulli URL
Config.Description: [REQUIRED] Full URL to your Tautulli server.

Config.Name: Tautulli API Key
Config.Description: [REQUIRED] Your API key from Tautulli Settings.

Config.Name: Radarr URL
Config.Description: (Optional) Full URL to your Radarr server.

Config.Name: Radarr API Key
Config.Description: (Optional) Your API key from Radarr Settings.

Config.Name: Sonarr URL
Config.Description: (Optional) Full URL to your Sonarr server.

Config.Name: Sonarr API Key
Config.Description: (Optional) Your API key from Sonarr Settings.
